page.title: 07Brecon County Library contd.
page.content: There are 13 sectins of books in the library. They are: Adult Fiction, Adult non-fiction,Adult Welsh,Local History, Adult Reference, Junior Fiction, Junior non-fiction, Junior Reference, Junior Welsh, newspapers, records,cassettes,and school related. The library posses a total of 659,287 books(including those stored away). There are 1945 records, and 773 cassetes in the library.8 daily papers and 60 magazines are taken for the library each week. There are 13 access points to the library, Brecon being the central one, and the others situated in Breconshire in the towns and villages. They are:- Brecon, Colbren, Cwmtwrch, Crickhowell ,Hay, Llanwrled, Sennybridge, Talgarth, Ystragynlai's, and 2 mobile libraies. The mobile libraries are vans,in which a selection of books from Brecon.
